spell1.name: ROTERSTERN
spell1.description: Fire explosive rounds with his blaster, Roterstern, damaging the target hit and enemies behind them.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Straight-line projectile that generates a spell field upon impact

attributes.label: RANGE
attributes.value: Cone-shaped spell field with a 5m radius and an apex angle of 90°

attributes.label: SPECIAL MECHANIC
attributes.value: Enemies that take damage from the projectile will no longer receive damage from the spell field

attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 20m, decreasing to 70% at 40m

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Enemies that take damage from the projectile will no longer receive damage from the spell field

spell2.name: KRAKEN IMPACT
spell2.description: Leap high, then dash forward and slam down with the bionic arm, dealing damage to enemies in range, marking them for Culling. Marked enemies will perish instantly if their health falls below a certain threshold, recharging the bionic arm for another Kraken Impact within a short period

attributes.label: NEXT KRAKEN IMPACT AFTER A CULLING

spell3.name: TROOPER'S FIST
spell3.description: Dash forward, seizing enemies along the path and launching up enemies at the end of the dash

spell4.name: TAINTED VOLTAGE
spell4.description: Charge up and launch a powerful electrical punch with the bionic arm in the target direction, dealing damage to enemies within range and Slowing them. This ability can Knock Down flying heroes

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Projectile that fires in a straight trajectory

spell5.name: BIONIC HOOK
spell5.description: Charge up and launch a hook with his bionic arm, reeling in the first target hit and enemies lurking behind

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Straight-line projectile that generates a spell field upon impact

attributes.label: RANGE
attributes.value: The projectile can travel up to 10m with a 0.5s charge. As the charge time increases, it can reach a maximum distance of 20m with a 1s charge

attributes.label: RANGE
attributes.value: Cone-shaped spell field with a 4.5m radius and an apex angle of 80°

spell6.name: CEASELESS CHARGE
spell6.description: Roterstern reloads automatically while the bionic arm is in action, granting Bonus Health to the Winter Soldier
